BindIP.Description: The IP to bind to on the control server.

DefaultLostLimit.Description: Number of missed checkins before exiting

DefaultProfile.Description: Default communication profile for the agent.
DefaultProfile.Value: /admin/get.php,/news.php,/login/process.php|Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko

KillDate.Description: Date for the listener to exit (MM/dd/yyyy).

Proxy.Description: Proxy to use for request (default, none, or other).

ProxyCreds.Description: Proxy credentials ([domain\]username:password) to use for request (default, none, or other).

SlackChannel.Description: The Slack channel or DM that notifications will be sent to.

SlackToken.Description: Your SlackBot API token to communicate with your Slack instance.

StagerURI.Description: URI for the stager. Must use /download/. Example: /download/stager.php

StagingKey.Description: Staging key for initial agent negotiation.

UserAgent.Description: User-agent string to use for the staging request (default, none, or other).

WorkingHours.Description: Hours for the agent to operate (09:00-17:00).
